channel.title: Leaflet on Humanistic Musings
channel.description: Recent content in Leaflet on Humanistic Musings

item.title: Tutorial Leaflet Chorophlets
item.description: Leaflet Leaflet is javascript library. You can access it, like many other cool interactive libraries (i.e., dygraphs) thanks to the work of people in RStudio. Here, I’ll layout a basic structure for plotting simple maps in leaflet and then how to advance them and plot chorophlets. Inspired by: https://rstudio.github.io/leaflet/choropleths.html https://stackoverflow.com/questions/47571337/how-to-create-a-choropleth-on-a-leaflet-map-r Loading packages library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.2.1 ── ## ✔ ggplot2 2.
